publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-676.2 Miss Annabel Goldie: Public Investments in the Infrastructure of Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S1M-676) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, leave out from "to increase" to end and insert; "other than using its powers to propose rises in taxation, to stimulate investment in Scotland’s essential public services and infrastructure." Supported by: Mr Murray Tosh*, Mr David Davidson*, Ben Wallace*, Nick Johnston*
